entry.title: Pink Lotus - Exhale Hand & Foot Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pink Lotus
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 12.00

Be tranquil unbound and restored with a beautiful blend of Rosemary & Bergamot. Experience the lightness and calmness of life when clarity is allowed to emerge.  Helps alleviate symptoms of mild anxiety and depression.

Ingredients: Water Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii, Avacado Oil, Steric Acid, Apricot Kernel Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Panthenol Hydrolyed Oats, Caprylyl Glycol, AHA 88%, Citrus Acid, Rosemary & Bergamot Essential Oils.

entry.title: Pink Lotus - Active Hand & Foot Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pink Lotus
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 12.00

Helps reduce inflammation and relieves pain and stiffness related to tension overuse or injury.

Ingredients: Water Eau, Shea Fruit Butter, Avacado Oil, Steric Acid, Apricot Kernel Oats, Panthenol Hydrolyed Oats, Sorbic Acid, AHA 88%, Signature Essential Oils.

entry.title: Pink Lotus - Flora Hand & Foot Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pink Lotus
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 12.00

Be luxurious and flirty with the inhalation of this aphrodisiac scent, thought to increase the attractiveness of the wearer with the aroma of jasmine and rose.

Ingredients: Water Eau, Shea Fruit Butter, Avacado Oil, Steric Acid, Apricot Kernel Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Panthenol Hydrolyed Oats, Citrus Acid, AHA, Signature Essential Oils.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Pink Lotus
Type: All Skin Types

Helps eliminate the discomfort of headaches and promotes relaxation with tranquility.

Ingredients: Water Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Fruit Butter), Persea Gratissima, Steric Acid, Apricot Kernel Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Panthenol Hydrolyed Oats, AHA, Signature Essential Oils.
